Jewelry Gift: Comes in a beautiful gift box, suitable for mom, wife, daughter, grandma, girlfriend, a friend on birthday, anniversary, graduation, engagement, wedding, Mother’s Day, Valentine’s Day, Thanksgiving, Christmas, etc.
Size: 1.06″x0.79″. Length: 17.7″+2″. Weight: about 6.1g. The jewelry for women is crafted in 925 sterling silver plated with gold to increase tarnish resistance. It’s lead-free, nickel-free and hypoallergenic.
HIGH-QUALITY CZ: Color is what gives the heart pendant its glamour. Colored gemstones will light up your face and enhance your look. The birthstone necklaces for women are sparkling jewelry for daily wear.
AFTER-SALE SERVICE: 90 Days Not Artificial Damage, Full Refund or Free Replacement Guarantee. If you have any problems with the women’s jewelry, please feel free to contact us.
